contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.efm8bb2_g.kit.si8051.efm8bb2_slstk2021a.demo.efm8bb2_rainbowblinky
contentItem.label: EFM8BB2 Rainbow Blinky
contentItem.description:
Rainbow Blinky Example

This example demonstrates the RGB LED using the joystick to control the color output.

Joystick shows VIBGYOR and white when moved in the eight directions

Observe
--------------
STK - LED and LCD

Mode
----------
Any
